services/.description: Root-level services/ directory contains legacy services (vast_service.py, template_service.py, deploy_wizard.py). These are separate from src/services/ which contains the main app services. When importing from root services/, use relative imports within that package.

web/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.jsx.description: TemplateDetailPage implements template detail view with deployment form. Uses Redux templateSlice for state management (fetchTemplateBySlug, fetchTemplateOffers, deployTemplate). Supports demo mode with DEMO_TEMPLATES and DEMO_GPU_OFFERS. GPU selection filters offers by template's gpu_min_vram requirement.
